nodes.text: Venzeiia 2 Prime was a planet located within the Venzeiia system of the Expansion Region that was subjugated by the Empire after the Battle of Hoth.

At some point following the Alliance to Restore the Republic defeat at Echo Base on Hoth at the hands of the Empire, it was subjugated by Imperial forces for harboring a Rebel spy in a modified YT-1300 transport.

In a training simulation for TIE pilots working to fly the advanced TIE/D Defender, they had to prevent a Rebel YT-1300 light freighter escaping from a salvage using the tractor beam of the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Glory.
